description: Try our easy to follow Chimichurri Seafood Skewers With Mango & Lime Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chimichurri Seafood Skewers With Mango & Lime Salsa
name: Chimichurri Seafood Skewers With Mango & Lime Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 ml extra virgin olive oil spray

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer skewers to a platter. Serve with mango salsa, tortillas, reserved red and green chimichurri, and extra lime.
